splits.name: Monster Beverage Corporation
splits.notes: Effected as 200% stock dividend. Board approved and announced Oct 14, 2016. Record date Oct 26, 2016. Shares distributed Nov 9, 2016. Split-adjusted trading began Nov 10, 2016. Outstanding shares tripled to approximately 571 million.

splits.name: The Toro Company
splits.notes: 2-for-1 forward split effected as 100% stock dividend. Announced Aug 18, 2016 alongside record Q3 FY2016 earnings. Record date Sep 1, 2016. Distribution date Sep 16, 2016. Split-adjusted trading began Sep 19, 2016.

splits.name: Under Armour, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved creation of Class C non-voting stock Jun 15, 2015. Shareholders approved Aug 2015; delayed by shareholder lawsuit settled Feb 29, 2016. Board approved issuance Mar 16, 2016. Record date Mar 28, 2016. Class C shares distributed Apr 7, 2016 (ex-date Apr 8, 2016). One-for-one Class C stock dividend to Class A and Class B holders, effectively a 2-for-1 split. Class C (non-voting) shares trade under 'UA'.
